pr_title: Fix artificially high queued query metrics

timeline.author: tdcmeehan

timeline.bodyText: Also add a check here to make sure we're not killing an already-running query.
timeline.author: tdcmeehan

replies.bodyText: Not sure why that should be necessary; the test will fail on line 115 if it gets as far as RUNNING
replies.author: jeremy-degroot

replies.bodyText: Query execution is proceeding in the background, so this is a last-moment check that the presumptions still hold.
replies.author: tdcmeehan
